thread.title: Echiejile In Full Monaco Action, Balogun Benched
thread.title_full: Echiejile In Full Monaco Action, Balogun Benched

author: Prince Imehiron
title: Echiejile In Full Monaco Action, Balogun Benched
text:
Headlines / Echiejile In Full Monaco Action, Balogun Benched Echiejile In Full Monaco Action, Balogun Benched Headlines , Top Stories 
By James Agberebi: 
Super Eagles defender Elderson Echiejile was in action for 90 minutes as 10-man AS Monaco played a 1-1 draw against visiting Lyon in Friday's French Ligue 1 clash. 
Mario Pasalic put Monaco ahead in the 39th minute, but in the 67th minute, Wallace was shown a straight red card for Monaco. 
Lyon made their one-man advantage count as they drew level with five minutes to go through former Manchester United defender Rafael. 
Echiejile was in action for the Eagles in their international friendly games against DR Congo and Cameroon. 
In Germany, Eagles defender, Leon Balogun, who was also played in the friendly matches in Belgium, was an unused substitute in Mainz's 2-0 home loss to Dortmund. 
Goals from Marco Reus and Henrik Mkhitaryan secured the win for Dortmund. 
In the Danish Superliga, Nigerian player, Babajide David, was an unused substitute as his team Midtjylland defeated Randers FC 2-1.
